name: SUPER PONG (TheSillyClown)
description:
Arrows keys to move

Do not let the 2 balls touch, if they do you lose hp which is represented by the bar in the middle of  your character. try to get the balls to hit crates to get powerups.

POWERUPS:

the shoe gives speed

the ball decreases ball speed

the mini crate decreases time between crates spawning

the heart gives you an hp 

when you die click your player to restart.

difficulty:  ★★★☆☆
